comment: ALLAH PAK‚ù§Ô∏èPIYARE MEHBOOB HAZRAT MUHAMMAD(S.A.W)‚ù§Ô∏èka sadqe hum or humare fimilies or sabse razi hojaye or sabko 5 waqth ki saee NIMAZ parrne ki toufeeq ata farmaye or sab majboor beemaro ki madad ata farmaye or non muslim ko hidayat ata farmaye or jo footh hochuka hei unko JANNAT UL FIRDOS mei ala moqam ata farmaye Ameen suma Ameen‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Have mercy on those on earth, and the One in heaven will have mercy upon you. By Allah, I only spoke of hunger, poverty, and difficult circumstances. Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best Disposer of affairs for those who find ourselves in this situation. My little brothers and I have gone three days without food. Every hour, the landlord calls, demanding rent and threatening to throw us out to the street if we don't pay. Allah is sufficient for us, and there is no power nor strength save with Allah. O people of merciful hearts, I swear by He who raised the sky and spread out the earth that no one will be found inside our house even with a single day‚Äôs sustenance other than the neighbors to support us while we suffer pain and woes. You who love your sons and daughters, we, your daughters, are suffering and in pain, and no one looks upon us with compassion. I commend you, you who love to do good, for we are orphans and have no one, and we are threatened with being thrown out of our home and onto the street if we do not pay the rent. God is witness that we have nothing to feed our hunger. I ask you by Allah, O readers of my message, and all those who are able to, to extend a helping hand to us, even with a little money, to the best of your ability. He will not delay this opportunity for us.00967736504944 Those who want to do good, I ask Allah, O you who have helped us and stood by our side. May Allah grant him Paradise. My brother in Allah, do not be stingy with us. I ask you by Allah to help as much as you can. May Allah grant you success......
